121 int32_t HWAutil_configCFAR(HWA_Handle handle,
122  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx,
123  uint32_t numRangeBins,
124  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
125  DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg *cfarCfg,
126  uint16_t detObjectListSize,
127  uint8_t dmaTriggerSource,
128  uint16_t hwaSourceBufOffset,
129  uint16_t hwaDestBufOffset,
130  uint8_t cfarDomain)
131 {
132  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
133  int32_t retVal = 0;
134 
135  retVal = HWA_enable(handle, 0); // Disable HWA
136  if (retVal != 0)
137  {
138  goto exit;
139  }
140 
141 
142  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
143  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
144  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSource;
145 
146  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.peakGroupEn = cfarCfg->peakGroupingEn;
147  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_CFAR;
148 
149  //cfarInpMode = 1, cfarLogMode = 1, cfarAbsMode = 00b
150  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.operMode = HWA_CFAR_OPER_MODE_LOG_INPUT_REAL;
151 
152  if(cfarDomain == DPU_CFAR_RANGE_DOMAIN)
153  {
154  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numRangeBins-1;
155  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numDopplerBins*sizeof(uint16_t);
156  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
157  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numDopplerBins-1;
158  }
159  else
160  {
161  if (cfarCfg->cyclicMode==1)
162  {
163  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = (numDopplerBins-1) + (cfarCfg->guardLen + cfarCfg->winLen) + (cfarCfg->guardLen + cfarCfg->winLen); //numDopplerBins-1
164  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = numDopplerBins - (cfarCfg->guardLen + cfarCfg->winLen);
165  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = mathUtils_floorLog2(numDopplerBins); //fix this
166  }
167  else
168  {
169  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numDopplerBins-1;
170  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0;
171  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0;
172  }
173 
174  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
175  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numDopplerBins*sizeof(uint16_t);
176  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numRangeBins-1;
177  }
178  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
179  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaSourceBufOffset;
180  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
181 
182  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaDestBufOffset;
183  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = detObjectListSize - 1;
184  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX;
185  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_32BIT;
186  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput);
187  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = 0; //don't care
188  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8;
189 
190  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numGuardCells = cfarCfg->guardLen;
191  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.nAvgDivFactor = cfarCfg->noiseDivShift;
192  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.cyclicModeEn = cfarCfg->cyclicMode;
193  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.nAvgMode = cfarCfg->averageMode;
194  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numNoiseSamplesRight = cfarCfg->winLen >> 1;
195  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numNoiseSamplesLeft = cfarCfg->winLen >> 1;
196  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.outputMode = HWA_CFAR_OUTPUT_MODE_I_PEAK_IDX_Q_NEIGHBOR_NOISE_VAL;
197 
198  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(handle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
199  if (retVal != 0)
200  {
201  goto exit;
202  }
203 
204  /* Disable trigger DMA/interrupt for this param set */
205  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(handle,
206  paramSetStartIdx,
207  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
208 
209 
210 exit:
211  return (retVal);
212 }

230 int32_t CFARCAHWA_config_EDMA
231 (
232  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
233  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources *pRes,
234  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_StaticConfig *staticCfg
235 )
236 {
237  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
238  EDMA_Handle edmaHandle = pRes->edmaHandle;
239  DPEDMA_ChainingCfg chainingCfg;
240  DPEDMA_syncACfg syncACfg;
241 
242  chainingCfg.chainingChan = pRes->edmaHwaInSignature.channel;
243  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
244  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
245 
246  syncACfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)pRes->detMatrix.data;
247  syncACfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)pRes->hwaMemInp;
248  syncACfg.aCount = staticCfg->numRangeBins * staticCfg->numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t);
249  syncACfg.bCount = 1;
250  syncACfg.srcBIdx = 0;
251  syncACfg.dstBIdx = 0;
252 
253  errorCode = DPEDMA_configSyncA_singleFrame(edmaHandle,
254  &pRes->edmaHwaIn,
255  &chainingCfg,
256  &syncACfg,
257  false, //isEventTriggered
258  false,//isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
259  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
260  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
261  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
262  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
263  {
264  goto exit;
265  }
266 
267  errorCode = DPEDMAHWA_configOneHotSignature(edmaHandle,
268  &pRes->edmaHwaInSignature,
269  hwaHandle,
270  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
271  false);
272 
273  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
274  {
275  goto exit;
276  }
277 
278 exit:
279  return(errorCode);
280 }

298 int32_t CFARHWA_prepareHwaRunTime
299 (
300  CFARHwaObj *cfarHwaObj,
301  uint32_t cfarDomain
302 )
303 {
304  int32_t retVal = 0;
305  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
306  DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg *pCfarCfg;
307  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx;
308 
309  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources *pRes = &cfarHwaObj->res;
310 
311  if (cfarDomain == DPU_CFAR_DOPPLER_DOMAIN)
312  {
313  pCfarCfg = &cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler;
314  paramSetStartIdx = pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
315  }
316  else
317  {
318  pCfarCfg = &cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgRange;
319  paramSetStartIdx = pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + 1;
320  }
321 
322  /* Disable the HWA */
323  retVal = HWA_enable(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle, 0); // set 1 to enable
324  if (retVal != 0)
325  {
326  goto exit;
327  }
328 
329  /***********************/
330  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
331  /***********************/
332  /* Config Common Registers */
333  hwaCommonConfig.configMask = HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
334  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
335  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
336  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
337  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD |
338  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_CFARTHRESHOLDSCALE;
339 
340  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = 1;
341  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
342  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
343  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
344  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
345  hwaCommonConfig.cfarConfig.cfarThresholdScale = pCfarCfg->thresholdScale;
346 
347  retVal = HWA_configCommon(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,&hwaCommonConfig);
348 
349 exit:
350  return retVal;
351 }

367 void CFARHWA_fovConvertRange(DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg *fovRangeCfg,
368  float rangeStep,
369  DPU_CFARCAProc_FovIdxCfg *fovRangeIdxCfg)
370 {
371  fovRangeIdxCfg->minIdx = (int16_t) (fovRangeCfg->min / rangeStep + 0.5);
372  fovRangeIdxCfg->maxIdx = (int16_t) (fovRangeCfg->max / rangeStep + 0.5);
373 }

391 void CFARHWA_fovConvertDoppler(DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg *fovDopplerCfg,
392  float dopplerStep,
393  DPU_CFARCAProc_FovIdxCfg *fovDopplerIdxCfg)
394 {
395  float doppler;
396 
397  doppler = (fovDopplerCfg->min / dopplerStep);
398  if (doppler < 0.)
399  {
400  doppler -= .5;
401  }
402  else
403  {
404  doppler += .5;
405 
406  }
407  fovDopplerIdxCfg->minIdx = (int16_t) doppler;
408 
409  doppler = (fovDopplerCfg->max / dopplerStep);
410  if (doppler < 0.)
411  {
412  doppler -= .5;
413  }
414  else
415  {
416  doppler += .5;
417 
418  }
419  fovDopplerIdxCfg->maxIdx = (int16_t) doppler;
420 
421 }

436 void CFARHWA_saveConfiguration(CFARHwaObj * cfarHwaObj,
437  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Config *cfarHwaCfg)
438 {
439  cfarHwaObj->staticCfg = cfarHwaCfg->staticCfg;
440  cfarHwaObj->res = cfarHwaCfg->res;
441  cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler = *cfarHwaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgDoppler;
442  cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgRange = *cfarHwaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgRange;
443  cfarHwaObj->staticCfg = cfarHwaCfg->staticCfg;
444 
445  CFARHWA_fovConvertDoppler(cfarHwaCfg->dynCfg.fovDoppler,
446  cfarHwaObj->staticCfg.dopplerStep,
447  &cfarHwaObj->fovDoppler);
448 
449  CFARHWA_fovConvertRange(cfarHwaCfg->dynCfg.fovRange,
450  cfarHwaObj->staticCfg.rangeStep,
451  &cfarHwaObj->fovRange);
452 }
453 int32_t CFARHWA_triggerCFAR(CFARHwaObj *cfarHwaObj, bool loadDataToHWA)
470 {
471  int32_t retVal = 0;
472  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources *pRes = &cfarHwaObj->res;
473 
474  /* Enable the HWA */
475  retVal = HWA_enable(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle, 1);
476  if (retVal != 0)
477  {
478  goto exit;
479  }
480  if (loadDataToHWA)
481  {
482  /* Trigger EDMA + CFAR Doppler */
483  retVal = EDMA_startTransfer(pRes->edmaHandle, pRes->edmaHwaIn.channel, EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA);
484  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
485  {
486  goto exit;
487  }
488  }
489  else
490  {
491  /* Trigger CFAR Range only */
492  retVal = HWA_setDMA2ACCManualTrig(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
493  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx);
494  if (retVal != 0)
495  {
496  goto exit;
497  }
498  }
499 exit:
500  return retVal;
501 }
502 
524 void CFARHWA_convHwaCfarDetListToDetMask(DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *hwaCfarDetList,
525  uint32_t numDopBins,
526  uint32_t numCfarDetections,
527  uint32_t cfarDomain,
528  uint32_t *cfarDetOutBitMask)
529 {
530  uint32_t i;
531  uint32_t bit, word;
532  uint32_t temp;
533  uint32_t cellOffset;
534  uint32_t iterOffset;
535 
536  if (cfarDomain == DPU_CFAR_RANGE_DOMAIN)
537  {
538  /*CFAR in Range domain, cellIdx is range index, iterNum is Doppler index*/
539  cellOffset = numDopBins;
540  iterOffset = 1;
541  }
542  else
543  {
544  /*CFAR in Doppler domain, cellIdx is Doppler index, iterNum is Range index*/
545  cellOffset = 1;
546  iterOffset = numDopBins;
547  }
548 
549  for (i=0; i < numCfarDetections; i++)
550  {
551  temp = hwaCfarDetList[i].cellIdx * cellOffset + hwaCfarDetList[i].iterNum * iterOffset;
552  word = temp >> 5;
553  bit = temp & 31;
554  cfarDetOutBitMask[word] |= 1 << bit;
555  }
556 }
557 
579 bool CFARHWA_isHwaCfarDetected(uint32_t rangeInd,
580  uint32_t dopplerInd,
581  uint32_t numDopBins,
582  uint32_t *cfarDetOutBitMask)
583 {
584  uint32_t bit, word;
585  uint32_t temp;
586 
587  temp = rangeInd * numDopBins + dopplerInd;
588  word = temp >> 5;
589  bit = temp & 31;
590  if (cfarDetOutBitMask[word] & (1 << bit))
591  {
592  return true;
593  }
594  else
595  {
596  return false;
597  }
598 }
599 
634 uint32_t CFARHWA_cfarRange_AND_cfarDoppler(
635  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *cfarRangeDetOutList,
636  uint32_t numCfarRangeDet,
637  uint32_t *cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask,
638  DPIF_CFARDetList *cfarDetectionList,
639  uint32_t cfarDetectionListSize,
640  uint16_t *detMat,
641  uint16_t numDopplerBins,
642  int16_t selRangeMin,
643  int16_t selRangeMax,
644  int16_t selDopplerMin,
645  int16_t selDopplerMax,
646  bool andWithCfarDopplerOut
647  )
648 {
649  uint32_t numCfarDet;
650  uint32_t rangeIdx;
651  uint32_t dopplerIdx;
652  int32_t dopplerSgnIdx;
653  uint32_t i;
654  uint32_t cellLog2NoiseQ9;
655  bool addToList;
656  float snrdB, noisedB;
657 
658  numCfarDet = 0;
659  for (i=0; i < numCfarRangeDet; i++)
660  {
661  rangeIdx = cfarRangeDetOutList[i].cellIdx;
662  dopplerIdx = cfarRangeDetOutList[i].iterNum;
663  dopplerSgnIdx = (int32_t ) dopplerIdx;
664  if (dopplerSgnIdx >= (int32_t)(numDopplerBins>>1))
665  {
666  dopplerSgnIdx = dopplerSgnIdx - (int32_t)numDopplerBins;
667  }
668  cellLog2NoiseQ9 = cfarRangeDetOutList[i].noise;
669  if ((rangeIdx >= selRangeMin) &&
670  (rangeIdx <= selRangeMax) &&
671  (dopplerSgnIdx >= selDopplerMin) &&
672  (dopplerSgnIdx <= selDopplerMax))
673  {
674  if (andWithCfarDopplerOut)
675  {
676  addToList = CFARHWA_isHwaCfarDetected(rangeIdx, dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins, cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask);
677  }
678  else
679  {
680  addToList = true;
681  }
682  if (addToList)
683  {
684  cfarDetectionList[numCfarDet].rangeIdx = rangeIdx;
685  cfarDetectionList[numCfarDet].dopplerIdx = dopplerIdx;
686  snrdB = ((float) detMat[rangeIdx * numDopplerBins + dopplerIdx] - (float) cellLog2NoiseQ9) * 6. /512.;
687  noisedB = ((float) cellLog2NoiseQ9) * 6. /512.;
688  cfarDetectionList[numCfarDet].noise = noisedB * 10.;
689  cfarDetectionList[numCfarDet].snr = snrdB * 10.;
690  numCfarDet++;
691  if (numCfarDet >= cfarDetectionListSize)
692  {
693  break;
694  }
695  }
696  }
697  }
698  return numCfarDet;
699 }
700 
701 DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_init
702 (
703  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_InitParams *initCfg,
704  int32_t* errCode
705 )
706 {
707  CFARHwaObj *cfarHwaObj = NULL;
708  SemaphoreP_Params semParams;
709  *errCode = 0;
710 
711  if ((initCfg == NULL) || (initCfg->hwaHandle == NULL))
712  {
713  *errCode = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
714  goto exit;
715  }
716 
717  cfarHwaObj = MemoryP_ctrlAlloc(sizeof(CFARHwaObj), 0);
718  if (cfarHwaObj == NULL)
719  {
720  *errCode = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEM;
721  goto exit;
722  }
723 
724  /* Save for debugging */
725 #ifdef DBG_CFAR_HWA_OBJ_DPU
726  if (gCfarHwaObjInd < RL_MAX_SUBFRAMES)
727  {
728  gCfarHwaObj[gCfarHwaObjInd++] = cfarHwaObj;
729  }
730 #endif
731 
732  /* Initialize memory */
733  memset((void *)cfarHwaObj, 0, sizeof(CFARHwaObj));
734 
735  /* Save init config params */
736  cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle = initCfg->hwaHandle;
737 
738  /* Create semaphore for HWA done */
739  SemaphoreP_Params_init(&semParams);
740  semParams.mode = SemaphoreP_Mode_BINARY;
741  cfarHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle = SemaphoreP_create(0, &semParams);
742  if(cfarHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle == NULL)
743  {
744  *errCode = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ESEMA;
745  goto exit;
746  }
747 
748 exit:
749 
750  if(*errCode < 0)
751  {
752  /* Free the object if it was allocated */
753  if(cfarHwaObj != NULL)
754  {
755  MemoryP_ctrlFree(cfarHwaObj, sizeof(CFARHwaObj));
756  cfarHwaObj = NULL;
757  }
758  }
759 
760  return ((DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle)cfarHwaObj);
761 }
762 
763 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_config
764 (
765  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle handle,
766  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Config *cfarHwaCfg
767 )
768 {
769  int32_t retVal = 0;
770 
771  CFARHwaObj *cfarHwaObj = (CFARHwaObj *)handle;
772  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources *pRes = &cfarHwaCfg->res;
773  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_StaticConfig *staticCfg = &cfarHwaCfg->staticCfg;
774 
775  if(cfarHwaObj == NULL)
776  {
777  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
778  goto exit;
779  }
780 
781 
782  if (pRes->hwaCfg.numParamSet != DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_NUM_HWA_PARAM_SETS)
783  {
784  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL__NUM_PARAM_SETS;
785  goto exit;
786  }
787 
788  /* Check if detection matrix format is supported. */
789  if(pRes->detMatrix.datafmt != DPIF_DETMATRIX_FORMAT_1)
790  {
791  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL__DET_MATRIX_FORMAT;
792  goto exit;
793  }
794 
795  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->detMatrix.data,
796  DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_DET_MATRIX_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
797  {
798  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_DET_MATRIX;
799  goto exit;
800  }
801 
802  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->cfarRngDopSnrList,
803  DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
804  {
805  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_CFAR_DET_LIST;
806  goto exit;
807  }
808 
809  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->hwaMemOutDoppler,
810  DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_HWA_MEM_OUT_DOPPLER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
811  {
812  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_HWA_MEM_OUT_DOPPLER;
813  goto exit;
814  }
815 
816  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->hwaMemOutRange,
817  DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_HWA_MEM_OUT_RANGE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
818  {
819  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_HWA_MEM_OUT_RANGE;
820  goto exit;
821  }
822 
823  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask,
824  DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_DOPPLER_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
825  {
826  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_DOPPLER_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK;
827  goto exit;
828  }
829 
830  /* check if input M scratch for detection matrix has
831  * entire detection matrix fitting in it */
832  if ((pRes->hwaMemInpSize * sizeof(uint16_t)) < pRes->detMatrix.dataSize)
833  {
834  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEM__DET_MATRIX_EXCEEDS_HWA_INP_MEM;
835  goto exit;
836  }
837 
838  /* check if input scratch memory for bit mask is sufficient */
839  if ((pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize * 32U) <
840  (staticCfg->numDopplerBins * staticCfg->numRangeBins))
841  {
842  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_ENOMEM__INSUFFICIENT_DOP_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK;
843  goto exit;
844  }
845 
846  CFARHWA_saveConfiguration(cfarHwaObj, cfarHwaCfg);
847 
848  if (cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale > 0)
849  {
850  /**************************************/
851  /* CFAR DOPPLER DOMAIN */
852  /**************************************/
853  retVal = HWAutil_configCFAR(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
854  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
855  staticCfg->numRangeBins,
856  staticCfg->numDopplerBins,
857  &cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler,
858  pRes->hwaMemOutDopplerSize,
859  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, /* dmaTriggerSrc */
860  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemInp),
861  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemOutDoppler),
862  DPU_CFAR_DOPPLER_DOMAIN);
863  if (retVal != 0)
864  {
865  goto exit;
866  }
867  }
868 
869  /**************************************/
870  /* CFAR RANGE DOMAIN */
871  /**************************************/
872  retVal = HWAutil_configCFAR(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
873  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + 1,
874  staticCfg->numRangeBins,
875  staticCfg->numDopplerBins,
876  &cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgRange,
877  pRes->hwaMemOutRangeSize,
878  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, /* dmaTriggerSrc */
879  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemInp),
880  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemOutRange),
881  DPU_CFAR_RANGE_DOMAIN);
882  if (retVal != 0)
883  {
884  goto exit;
885  }
886 
887  /* Configure EDMA */
888  retVal = CFARCAHWA_config_EDMA(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle, pRes, staticCfg);
889  if (retVal != 0)
890  {
891  goto exit;
892  }
893 
894 exit:
895  return retVal;
896 }
897 
898 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_process
899 (
900  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle handle,
901  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_OutParams *outParams
902 )
903 {
904  volatile uint32_t startTime;
905  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
906  uint16_t numObjs = 0;
907  uint32_t cfarDomain;
908  bool loadDataToHWA;
909  bool andWithCfarDopplerOut;
910  int32_t retVal = 0;
911  uint32_t waitTimeLocal = 0;
912 
913  CFARHwaObj *cfarHwaObj;
914  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources *pRes;
915  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_StaticConfig *staticCfg;
916 
917  if (handle == NULL)
918  {
919  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
920  goto exit;
921  }
922 
923  cfarHwaObj = (CFARHwaObj *)handle;
924  pRes = &cfarHwaObj->res;
925  staticCfg = &cfarHwaObj->staticCfg;
926 
927  startTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
928 
929 
930  /**********************************************/
931  /* ENABLE NUMLOOPS DONE INTERRUPT FROM HWA */
932  /**********************************************/
933  retVal = HWA_enableDoneInterrupt(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
934  CFARCAHWADoneIsrCallback,
935  cfarHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
936  if (retVal != 0)
937  {
938  goto exit;
939  }
940  if (cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale > 0)
941  {
942  cfarDomain = DPU_CFAR_DOPPLER_DOMAIN;
943  retVal = CFARHWA_prepareHwaRunTime (cfarHwaObj, cfarDomain);
944  if (retVal != 0)
945  {
946  goto exit;
947  }
948 
949  /* Trigger CFAR */
950  loadDataToHWA = true;
951  retVal = CFARHWA_triggerCFAR(cfarHwaObj, loadDataToHWA);
952  if (retVal != 0)
953  {
954  goto exit;
955  }
956 
957  /* In parallel with HWA zero cfarDetOutBitMask while HWA doing CFAR */
958  memset (pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask, 0x0, pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize * sizeof(uint32_t));
959 
960  /* wait for the paramSets done interrupt */
961  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
962  SemaphoreP_pend(cfarHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle, SemaphoreP_WAIT_FOREVER);
963  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
964 
965  HWA_readCFARPeakCountReg(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle, (uint8_t *) &cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs, sizeof(uint16_t));
966  if (cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs > cfarHwaObj->res.hwaMemOutDopplerSize)
967  {
968  cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs = cfarHwaObj->res.hwaMemOutDopplerSize;
969  }
970  }
971 
972  /* Do CFAR Range */
973  /* Prepare Common Reg and CFAR threshold */
974  cfarDomain = DPU_CFAR_RANGE_DOMAIN;
975  retVal = CFARHWA_prepareHwaRunTime (cfarHwaObj, cfarDomain);
976  if (retVal != 0)
977  {
978  goto exit;
979  }
980 
981  /* Trigger CFAR Range */
982  if (cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale > 0)
983  {
984  loadDataToHWA = false;
985  }
986  else
987  {
988  loadDataToHWA = true;
989  }
990  retVal = CFARHWA_triggerCFAR(cfarHwaObj, loadDataToHWA);
991  if (retVal != 0)
992  {
993  goto exit;
994  }
995 
996  if (cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale > 0)
997  {
998  /* In parallel with HWA convert Doppler CFAR output list into bit mask */
999  CFARHWA_convHwaCfarDetListToDetMask((DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * ) pRes->hwaMemOutDoppler,
1000  staticCfg->numDopplerBins,
1001  cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs,
1002  DPU_CFAR_DOPPLER_DOMAIN,
1003  pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask);
1004  }
1005 
1006  /* wait for the paramSets done interrupt */
1007  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1008  SemaphoreP_pend(cfarHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle, SemaphoreP_WAIT_FOREVER);
1009  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
1010 
1011  HWA_readCFARPeakCountReg(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
1012  (uint8_t *) &cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs,
1013  sizeof(uint16_t));
1014  if (cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs > cfarHwaObj->res.hwaMemOutRangeSize)
1015  {
1016  cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs = cfarHwaObj->res.hwaMemOutRangeSize;
1017  }
1018 
1019  if (cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale > 0)
1020  {
1021  andWithCfarDopplerOut = true;
1022  }
1023  else
1024  {
1025  andWithCfarDopplerOut = false;
1026  }
1027 
1028  cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs = CFARHWA_cfarRange_AND_cfarDoppler(
1029  (DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * ) pRes->hwaMemOutRange,
1030  cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs,
1031  pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask,
1032  pRes->cfarRngDopSnrList,
1033  pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize,
1034  pRes->detMatrix.data,
1035  staticCfg->numDopplerBins,
1036  cfarHwaObj->fovRange.minIdx,
1037  cfarHwaObj->fovRange.maxIdx,
1038  cfarHwaObj->fovDoppler.minIdx,
1039  cfarHwaObj->fovDoppler.maxIdx,
1040  andWithCfarDopplerOut);
1041 
1042  numObjs = cfarHwaObj->numHwaCfarObjs;
1043  cfarHwaObj->numProcess++;
1044 
1045  /* Disable the HWA */
1046  retVal = HWA_enable(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle, 0);
1047  if (retVal != 0)
1048  {
1049  numObjs = 0U;
1050  goto exit;
1051  }
1052 
1053 
1054  outParams->numCfarDetectedPoints = numObjs;
1055  HWA_disableDoneInterrupt(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle);
1056  outParams->stats.waitTime = waitTimeLocal;
1057  outParams->stats.processingTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime - waitTimeLocal;
1058  outParams->stats.numProcess = cfarHwaObj->numProcess;
1059 exit:
1060  return (retVal);
1061 }
1062 
1063 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_control
1064 (
1065  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle handle,
1066  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd cmd,
1067  void *arg,
1068  uint32_t argSize
1069 )
1070 {
1071  int32_t retVal = 0;
1072  CFARHwaObj *cfarHwaObj = (CFARHwaObj *)handle;
1073  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_StaticConfig *staticCfg = &cfarHwaObj->staticCfg;
1074  DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HW_Resources *pRes = &cfarHwaObj->res;
1075 
1076  /* Get rangeProc data object */
1077  if (cfarHwaObj == NULL)
1078  {
1079  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1080  goto exit;
1081  }
1082 
1083  switch(cmd)
1084  {
1085  case DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_CfarRangeCfg:
1086  {
1087  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg)) ||
1088  (arg == NULL))
1089  {
1090  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1091  goto exit;
1092  }
1093  else
1094  {
1095  /* Save configuration */
1096  memcpy((void *)&cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgRange, arg, argSize);
1097 
1098  /**************************************/
1099  /* CFAR RANGE DOMAIN */
1100  /**************************************/
1101  retVal = HWAutil_configCFAR(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
1102  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + 1, //Range position
1103  staticCfg->numRangeBins,
1104  staticCfg->numDopplerBins,
1105  &cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgRange,
1106  pRes->hwaMemOutRangeSize,
1107  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, /* dmaTriggerSrc */
1108  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemInp),
1109  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemOutRange),
1110  DPU_CFAR_RANGE_DOMAIN);
1111  if (retVal != 0)
1112  {
1113  goto exit;
1114  }
1115  }
1116  }
1117  break;
1118  case DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_CfarDopplerCfg:
1119  {
1120  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg)) ||
1121  (arg == NULL))
1122  {
1123  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1124  goto exit;
1125  }
1126  else
1127  {
1128  /* Save configuration */
1129  memcpy((void *)&cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler, arg, argSize);
1130 
1131  /**************************************/
1132  /* CFAR DOPPLER DOMAIN */
1133  /**************************************/
1134  retVal = HWAutil_configCFAR(cfarHwaObj->hwaHandle,
1135  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //Doppler position
1136  staticCfg->numRangeBins,
1137  staticCfg->numDopplerBins,
1138  &cfarHwaObj->cfarCfgDoppler,
1139  pRes->hwaMemOutDopplerSize,
1140  pRes->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, /* dmaTriggerSrc */
1141  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemInp),
1142  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(pRes->hwaMemOutDoppler),
1143  DPU_CFAR_DOPPLER_DOMAIN);
1144  if (retVal != 0)
1145  {
1146  goto exit;
1147  }
1148  }
1149  }
1150  break;
1151  case DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_FovRangeCfg:
1152  {
1153  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg)) ||
1154  (arg == NULL))
1155  {
1156  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1157  goto exit;
1158  }
1159  else
1160  {
1161  /* Save configuration */
1162  CFARHWA_fovConvertRange(arg,
1163  cfarHwaObj->staticCfg.rangeStep,
1164  &cfarHwaObj->fovRange);
1165  }
1166  }
1167  break;
1168  case DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Cmd_FovDopplerCfg:
1169  {
1170  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg)) ||
1171  (arg == NULL))
1172  {
1173  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1174  goto exit;
1175  }
1176  else
1177  {
1178  /* Save configuration */
1179  CFARHWA_fovConvertDoppler(arg,
1180  cfarHwaObj->staticCfg.dopplerStep,
1181  &cfarHwaObj->fovDoppler);
1182  }
1183  }
1184  break;
1185  default:
1186  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1187  break;
1188  }
1189 exit:
1190  return (retVal);
1191 }
1192 
1193 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_deinit(DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Handle handle)
1194 {
1195  int32_t retVal = 0;
1196  if (handle == NULL)
1197  {
1198  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1199  goto exit;
1200  }
1201  MemoryP_ctrlFree(handle, sizeof(CFARHwaObj));
1202 exit:
1203  return (retVal);
1204 }

CFARHwaObj_t::numProcess
